executable.title: Train Segmentation Network
executable.description: Trains a neural network to segment structures from whole-slide image
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of efforts in digital pathology by the Sarder Lab: SUNY Buffalo.

directory.name: inputFolder
directory.label: Training Data Folder
directory.description: Select the folder containing the slides to be used for training

string-vector.name: classes
string-vector.label: Training layers
string-vector.description: A comma spearated list of the annotation layer names used for training. The name needs to match exactly. Layers will be built up from the annotations in order, sub-compartments should come after their parent structures.

file.name: inputModelFile_data
file.label: Input Model File - data
file.description: Tensorflow model file (model.ckpt-*.data*) of the deeplab model for transfer learning

file.name: inputModelFile
file.label: Input Model File - index
file.description: Tensorflow model file (model.ckpt-*.index) of the deeplab model for transfer learning

parameters.label: WSI Training Parameters
parameters.description: Parameters for training a whole-slide image (WSI) segmentation algorythm

integer.name: patch_size
integer.label: Training tile size
integer.description: Tile size for randomly cropped WSI regions (pixels)

integer.name: steps
integer.label: Training steps
integer.description: The number of steps used for network training. The network will see [steps * batch size] image patches during training

integer.name: batch_size
integer.label: Training batch size
integer.description: The batch size for training on WSI patches

parameters.label: Girder API URL and Key
parameters.description: A Girder API URL and token for Girder client
